title: PSA: When a Skarner player pulls an enemy to You..
body:
..It means he trusts You. He's been watching You since the beginning of the game, and he's like:"Yes, he'll be the one i'll kill my enemy with, i have faith in him, and he won't let me down." 
Think about it, don't let him down.

replies.body:
To the guy that never attacks the enemy champion Skarner brings him. . . .

http://i.imgur.com/ABj3r.gif/?noredirect

You know who you are.
Sometimes a good strategy on Skarner is to drag the frontline tank away from his team so your allies can dive the squishes
share the message: Don't be that guy!

When a Skarner player pulls an enemy to you.. 

Start backing, he can handle it.
Don't ks him, amirite
especially if in nexus fountain
B)

{{champion:72}} alright i'm gonna pull the adc to you so you can land your full combo. 

{{champion:163}}   *throws out her full combo and misses cause you were pulling the adc* 

every fucking time.

This just makes me think of Lee Sin kicking the target away and ruining Skarner play. 

I hate Lee Sin.

now i can't shake it out of my head....why you do this T-T 

Think about a Skarner ulting a Lee Sin who just kicked him....better?
Ive had lee sins kick people out of my malz ult before
Vayne, TK, poppy, alistar..... literally any champ that has displacement built into their kit has fucked over my malz ults at least once.

HIKKUUUUUU

http://iwannarofl.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/HIKUUUU.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Morde,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f5ZtV6PM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-06T19:41:10.258+0000)
>
> This just makes me think of Lee Sin kicking the target away and ruining Skarner play. 
> 
> I hate Lee Sin.

You  think that's good? How about being fiddle and fearing a yi who popped ghostblade and ult. Nothing funnier than seeing him run in the opposite direction at Mach 7

Excuse me, you were just about to land a skillshot that would have killed an enemy champion?


HIKU!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Morde,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f5ZtV6PM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-06T19:41:10.258+0000)
>
> This just makes me think of Lee Sin kicking the target away and ruining Skarner play. 
> 
> I hate Lee Sin.

I like it when the enemy lee sin ults after I've grabbed his teammate. He doesn't realize his mistake until it's too late.

Skarner main here.  This is only true, but only sometimes.  I might just want to show you how quickly I can kill them, like when a cat brings a dead mouse to an owner.  Or it means you did something to tick me off, and I'm bringing the assassian to you.  {{champion:72}} {{summoner:6}}

lol

Like when tahm kench spits out their adc at you after ulting and you just kill them

>  ~~you just kill them~~ **they just kill you**

ftfy

> [{quoted}](name=GoatPope,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f5ZtV6PM,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-12-06T22:54:20.514+0000)
>
> lol
> 
> Like when tahm kench spits out their adc at you after ulting and you just kill them

And then the enemy vayne goes doublelift and 1v5s everyone and you get flamed for it.

To the Skarner players that pull the enemy's initiator into the middle of the team, fuck you.

I'm talking to you idiots that pull Malphite to the middle of the team when Yasuo is right behind; the ones who pull Sej in for a free 3-5 man ult.

Well with the current state of the damage in the game it's almost impossible for skarner to get to the back line. So when he starts pulling that malph you betta start bursting him down quick. Just saying
'

... Or just don't pull anyone.

Same applies to blitz vs amumu and kennen, god blitz players are obsessed with grabbing things for those juicy plays (by the enemy team)

{{champion:222}}: Hey, Karma, look! Skarner is dragging someone over here.

{{champion:43}}: Run.

{{champion:222}}: What, why? Let's get a free ki-

{{champion:72}}: [Dragging a 12/2 {{champion:238}} at maximum speed]

{{champion:222}}: oh sweet jesus

[ENEMY TRIPLE KILL]

[*Waiting to spawn*]
{{champion:72}} :"s-sorry guys, but...we're all cool...right?"
{{champion:43}}: "Yeah, at least he got his free AD from his ult on me."
So true.  Well put.
When a Singed flips someone to you KILL THAT SOMEONE.

Yeah I pull enemy champs to my team and my team runs away. Happens all the time. I have a feeling a lot of players don't understand how the skarner ult works and that they are suppose to just kill the guy, not run from him. It's really annoying sometimes when my team or the other champ in the area let's the enemy escape a certain death.
no no no, hes like a cat, it means he thinks you're a shitty hunter and he doesn't want you to starve
True statement.
I've had a Jinx flame me for carrying around an enemy champion as she just watched him... feels great man
http://i.imgur.com/t9VaIkp.gifv
